name: Sword Combo Rush
description:
Sword Combo Rush  is my second video game. Your character was put into a world and has to fight against monsters and the time. Reach the ending of each level in time to win. If the time runs out, your combos can save you!

I used the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam and the theme Dual Purpose Design as an opportunity to develop my second video game. I used all the epxerience I got from developing my very first game and tried new stuff like enemies, combat and combos.

The game was developed with the Godot Engine. Sounds was made with Bfxr.

Thank you for give it a try. I would be happy about your feedback and appreciate that you take the time to try it.

Known Issues

  • Sound isn't working in the web version
  • Fullscreen mode is enabled in the web version, but shouldn't - please play in the window mode, you will have a better experience and performance
